Text: Is this *really* a book on secure programming that's published by Microsoft?  Yikes!   ;)

This is the 1st edition. Better look around for the 2nd (2003) one.

Moreover, there's a problem with the code samples in this CHM: they can only be viewed by launching IE, which doesn't work in latest Windows versions due to security restrictions â€” oh, the ironyâ€Ś
